element.name: SW-MSV-Edition
element.description:
Star Wars 5E - MSV Edition is a comprehensive homebrew adaptation bringing Star Wars to D&D 5th Edition. This collection includes:

  • 40+ Playable Species: From iconic species like Humans, Twileks, and Wookiees to unique options like Protocol Droids and Combat Droids
  • 5 Custom Classes: Knight (Force-sensitive guardian), Marauder (aggressive Force warrior), Scout (agile specialist), Warrior (martial expert), and Inquisitor (stealthy operative)
  • Expanded Equipment: 100+ weapons including blasters, lightsabers, vibroweapons, and more
  • Star Wars Gear: Armor, shields, tools, healing items, explosives, and specialized equipment
  • Fighting Styles & Maneuvers: Unique combat options tailored to the Star Wars universe
  • Backgrounds & Languages: Galaxy-appropriate character origins and communication options

This homebrew is designed to provide a complete Star Wars tabletop experience using the D&D 5E ruleset.

setters.set: Written by Marcus SV and Coded by MrBlu03
